Html:
Hi all! There is an interesting thing was happened with me! Using mobile phone modem, program loads maps without any problems, but last time I was connected to the new Internet provider and I have got some problem that is trouble my mind(. I can't load maps and from now I have no idea what should I do. Help me please if it is possible. I should be thankful to any idea You telling me.

Additional info:

The Internet  provided by static IP without any VPN - connections.

radioman
Coordinator
Thu at 8:44 PM
what map? what errors?

 

Hello! There was problem with all the maps! They was loading only from downloaded cache. I found out the solution of  "problem" myself)

In my IE settings there was written some previously configured proxy. When I changed settings to default all problems gone!

It will be good to do this default settings inside the program. I'll try to do this in "near future"...
